text: Tsey khto zazdryly yo den π pered skazav, "Zaraz my zdiysnyuyemo shcho BOH yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto zabezpechuye dlya whomever Vin vybyraye z chysla Yoho sluzhbovtsiv, ta utrymuye. Yakshcho tse bulo ne dlya BOZHOYI charivnosti do nas, Vin mih vyklykaly zemlyu kovtnuty nas takozh. My zaraz zdiysnyuyemo shcho disbelievers nikoly ne mayemo uspikh
